content.detailedDescription: My friend has broke, so i went to meet him in my car and he phoned his roommate who had tow ropes so when he arrived we took the back roads home so we could go slow and not hold up traffic, i was behind him with my hazard lights on to warm rear approaching cars and saw this very bright green light so i stopped and got out of my car to watch and it hovered then went in a straight line then kept repeating that pattern. the object slowly faded away. i first noticed the object when looking at the sky as it was a clear midnight sky and the stars were out, (im a nutter for space lol) . i literally froze for those aprox 4 minutes as i watched this object fly over head.
content.summary: Fixed green light which game the shape of a strange looking triangle object.

content.detailedDescription:
if i may, i must digress, because my experiances go way back to childhood and i believe would peek your interest.
   in, or about, 1962 in nyc, manhattan, mid-town, close to the hudson river, i had my first experiance. i was 4 years old at the time, but very sharp and understanding of such things, as ufos and alien abductions. why? because it seemed to be happening for generations of my family, which made it easier to communicate to my elders and other relatives. most of my relatives that lived at one time or other in the caribean, primarily puerto rico. puerto rico, which even today is a hot spot for ufo activities.
   well, as i was saying. my story, for a lack of a better word, because story doesn't give the right tone, or feel.
   i was 4 years old at home with my mother and baby brother in the living room, when a strange shape seemed to glance past our window. it was a window that displayed the hudson river area, where ships once docked, or were mored by the navy.
   it was silver in color, rounded like a saucer shape, silent, but gave off a weird vibe to the body. i turned then to catch my mother's eye and attention, but by then she was leaving toward the bedroom with my baby brother. so, i decided to investigate via the front living room window were i first sighted the object. it had a fire-escape, which most nyc apartments did at the time, and followed it across and then up it went.
   once i assured my mom that i was going to sit out on the fire-escape, i preceeded to go out. there is were it got scary for sure. instinctly i felt something weird happening to me, like a mental communication entering my mind, pulling out the window. it was then that i resisted, but curiousity got the best of me. so, i saw these two creatures climbing down towards me asking for my hand, and all i thought was "no way". believe it or not, it was mentally painful to resist. it terrofided me, and still does since then. yes, i did tell my mother and that's when she told me about her experiances, and that of her sisters and mother. it didn't seem to surprise her. it was as if she had been awaiting for one of us to one day tell her about our encounter.
  since then, i've had numerous encounters, some more extrordinary than others.
  one of the encounters that stand out more than any other was the experiance i had on fort dix, on january of 1978. there i was in the military, the u.S. army, as a [designation removed(1)/cms/tg] covering range exercises in the field for basic training units. 
  i was heading out to freedom ridge, an area used to simulate combat for the basic training companies. they, the soldiers, learned to perform in a field environment and live for a couple of days with their drill sergeants. we, the [designation removed(2)/cms/tg], covered the ranges in shift of two every 12 hours. i, along with another [designation removed(2)/cms/tg], were scheduled to cover the night shift, which was from  8 p.M. to 8 a.M. and we stayed in a modified single wide trailer, which also served as [designation removed(2)/cms/tg] station, in case there were any injuries we could treat them and get them back to garrison and the hospital ( ireland army hospital).
  so, to get to this site we drove rountinely through texas ave, passing mcguire afb, then a left towards freedom ridge, which is where the incident occured. and before i go further, i must say that i saw a case finally on t.V. that showed this incident, and boy was i elated, because i had told just a limited number of people this, and i always felt as if i were looked at as being crazy. this episode had totally vindicated me and my story. my wife must have told me to shut up a million times there after, because i kept repeating it, because i was so happy it came out. 
  well, the article called it the fort dix/mcguire afb incident. so, here it goes. it was in january of 1978 about 7 p.M. and we, there other [designation removed(2)/cms/tg] and i, were preparing the supplies and food for the stay in the [designation removed(2)/cms/tg]al trailer, and we hit the road at about 7:15 to 7:30 p.M., and yes we were running late. we usaully left about a quarter after 6 p.M., but yes, we used to drive very fast,especially since, once off of texas ave. it was a straight shot to freedom ridge. on this day, we, i being the driver, turned left off of texas ave and to the road to freedom ridge, when an usually colored craft caught my eye on the left side of the road. i mentioned it to my friend, but he stated that he wasn't paying attention to the road. so, i continued the journey on. there is a check point that is approximately half way between texas ave and freedom ridge, and i hadn't got there yet, when i saw it.
   it was colorful, bright,pulsating in a circular motion, very close to the ground, but not quite on it yet. i turned to "s", as i called my friend the [designation removed(2)/cms/tg], and asked if he seen that. he looked and i saw the terror on his face, which was accompanied with " get the f#*+ out of here". he out ranked me, but i had to check it out , i told him. he said "no". i was going to do what he said, but just then i saw multiple aliens running like crazies around the field, so i got out of the field ambulance, which is what we drove to the field, and decided to investigate, bull@#$% i thought it was the coolest @#$% i ever seen to that point. "s" was terrofide for sure. i mean to scare "s", it has to be extremely terrofying, because he was one tough dude. he was about 30 years old, muscular( muscles on his muscles), very macho, not to mention he was the pride of panama, but today, that night he was chicken little. by the way i was 20 years old and a private first class, he was a sergeant. so he had muscle and rank, yet he was cowaring in the corner of the passenger side of the field ambulance. he was reduced to a scared child like image, right before my eyes, which only convinced me that what i was seeing, was truly amazing.
   so, i looked back at him one more time and asked if he'd come with me, which he said "no" and "get your ass back in here now". i didn't want to put our friendship and proffessional relationship in peral, so i did the one thing that wouldn't jepordize it, i pretended not to hear him :-)
   then i entered the woods, following the creatures, and now a serious commotion developing in the woods, with what sounded like police lights, bull horns, and various frashlight devices. then a single creature/alien came across me and stared, and i stared. i heard a couple of shots in the field of woods and then i looked at the being again and felt a sorrow like feeling come over me , like a sadness or dispare. i then had a weird feeling over come me, then i was on the side of the field ambulance, where "s" was still seated, but differently, because now he wasn't slouch in the seat cowaring in the corner. he was upright, in a very proud demeanor, as he usually carried himself. i reached in and shook his shoulder and said "what's up man", but he replied "get in, we got to go". i asked him, "what happened?" he replied "let's go", so i got in and started driving toward freedom ridge, though for a while we both looked like robots, just sitting there stiff and quiet. then, as i was driving i saw the ship at a distance and civilian and military vehicles driving like mad men through the gates and up and down the same road i was on, accompanied by helicopters and trucks, but i kept driving, because smetie looked as though he was either going crap or cry or even both.
   the next thing that happened during this crazy episode was the time we had arrived at the [designation removed(2)/cms/tg]al trailer. remember we had left sevenish (p.M.), yet we arrived at approximately 11 to 11:30 p.M., and boy was the first shift pissed. they were yelling how f#*+ we were for arriving late and that they weren't going to releave us early or at 8 a.M. the next morning, because of the tardiness. "s" and i looked at our watches, because there was no way we could've been late, whcih is why we were arguing back, until we realized that they were right. how, i don't know, but it was true, we were late by about 4 hours, yet it seemed like, at most, maybe a hour. freaky !!!!
    once "s" and i settled in to the [designation removed(2)/cms/tg] trailer, i approached him to ask about what had happened and what's up with him, and he said " shut up and go lay down i have the first watch, which i reply, respectfully, "no", you lay down, because quit frankly, he looked like @#$%. no sooner did his head hit the rack, when he fell to sleep.
    i wanted to report it the next morning to the air force, or who ever gets the report, but when i asked "s" to back me and support me with my statement, he said "no, leave that @#$% alone, that might be @#$% of the devil, and i'm not @#$%ing with it and you shouldn't either. you don't have much time in the army yet, so don't @#$% with that, leave it alone. i don't want to remember." in his defence, i must say, "s" was very superstitous, like most panamians are. he always talked about voodo, the devil, the black or evil eye, things like that. i know of that stuff, but i don't give it much thought, and i'm puerto rican. not all of us get freaked out abouot that stuff.
     then strangely enough, i had seen a program about some guy off of cape fear in north carolina, fayetteville, talk about his experiance, and i must say, he was right on the money with the descriptions of both the alien and the ship, vehicle, craft, etc...  i saw it too. i don't know where and when he saw it , but i did too, numerous times. guess where? my back yard, and i'm not far from the cape fare river. i even had some landing marks on my back yard. i first seen it when we moved from cumberland county to bladen county, which is as country as it gets. that was in 2005 when we arrived and it lasted till 2008, and then it picked up again. once again, i was validated by someone's account. kool !!! so i can personally tell you, that man is not a flake, he's on it. 
     the hits keep coming around here. it used to be that it was a common occurance. sighting are, or, seem to be periodic in nature, but they happen. i'm not sure, but it may be associated with the near by air force base, which we have several around here, plus an airport, and a large military base , fort bragg.
     oh, if you're wondering, i have contiously been experiancing ufos thoughout my life. it didn't stop in 1962, or between that and 1978, or even now. and my brothers have had similar experiances too. it's in the family.
content.summary: Egg spaped, saucer, bright balls

content.detailedDescription:
Unknown designs and images in snow. 

digital images captured by my camera on fresh snow in the driveway.

i've sent 3 of the 26 pictures with the following notes:

132 - view from sidewalk up the driveway along my truck to the gate

135 - view of driveway from the sidewalk before shoveling the snow off it. the garage, tree trunks, telephone pole and the concrete safety barrier (along on the west side or right side) of the driveway produced the shadows

136 - view on far west side of the driveway closer to concrete safety barriers.

i've taken pictures of snow-rollers in the backyard but there are no snow-rollers left on the surface and either end of the designs. there are no mice holes and, the back and forth patterns just ends.

please note that i retain all rights to the story and digital images. we can discuss media coverage and use of the images.

i would like to discuss the images with an investigator.
content.summary: No ufo but it appears to be a coded message and design in snow that happened overnight. i took the pictures in the morning.

content.detailedDescription:
1974 cold winter evening moon lit night,standing on my porch i witnessed a sparking soccer ball size object 20' ft off the ground and 20'feet from me moving ne to se i could hear it sparking many different colors of sparks was over in 5 seconds.It missed every tree and it stayed 20' 
off the ground i watched it go over the top of the hill and it was gone.
content.summary: 1974 cold winter evening moon lit night,witnessed a sparking soccer ball size object 20 ft off the ground and 20 feet from me moving ne to se i could hear it sparking many different colors was over in 5 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I know you cant really see it but that thing was a triangle it had a bright light in the center there was people pulling over to see it this is not the first time seen something like this i've also seen a disc object with led types of light really bright a few miles away from this one it was raining and thundering and it was going into the clouds you could see the cloud light up from the inside it was amazingly crazy
content.summary: Me and my brother both saw this thing it was a triangle shape with a lights on it ive never seen anything like it

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was travelling with my wife and my 3 childrens in a mountain road , in cayey (puerto rico), when i saw two  orange lights in the sky. i stop my car and one of the light wasn´t there and the other turn off the light, and i saw the object, it was like a black lemon. then  the object  the object began to descend into a mountain and  lost it.
content.summary: Two objects one disappeared disappeared before getting out of the car. the other turn off the light before i start recording. and descended in a mountain.

content.detailedDescription:
An unidentified object seen descending down in a spiral path making a pattern of continuous 3s leaving behind a trail of smoke/gas which looked much like a damaged fighter plane. but it didn't make any sound and had a body as the size of a 'full stop' .
it was at around 10:15 am approx today on 12th of january, 2015 when we spotted it south west of tezpur , sonitpur in the state of assam , india.
our first assumption was of a jet in an air show then we assumed it to be a crashing jet. 
when we analysed it later our analysis said that it was s very tiny object almost of the size of a full stop descending towards lower altitude at a high speed making zero noise leaving a  trail of white gaseous substance as seen from the ground forming a pattern similar as the number '3' of english numerical. we had no idea whatever it was , luckily i was carrying my slr along but due to lack of time and its increasing speed i didn't get enough time to take a proper photograph. i am confused whether it was a jet, a drone, a meteor or any otherr object.
we lost track of the object as it reached the horizon , it got lost amont the high ends of the betel nut trees as seen from the ground.
content.summary: An unidentified object seen descending down in a spiral path making a pattern of continuous 3s leaving behind a trail of smoke/gas which looked much like a damaged fighter plane. but it didn't make any sound and had a body as the size of a 'full stop' .

content.detailedDescription: Attending the trinidad, ca lighthouse tour and taking photographs.  noticed the ufo orbs later that evening while processing my images.
content.summary: Taking photos at a scheduled blm event at trinidad head, ca lighthouse.  ufo orbs were identified during image processing later that evening

content.detailedDescription:
In answwer to questions:
1: 1/4 of a mile from home driving car with 2 people in middle of nite to buy slupees from local 7/11. summer time
2: the 3 of us riding in car and would have to be blind not to notice this triangular object.
3 & 4: triangular oblect hovering high over houses in this neighborhood of single family homes which are approximately 3500square ft in size. trying to give you a scale of object. object in a westerly direction hovering flat. it moves from being in a horizontal flat position to moving to a vertical position. we could see this as a result of the object's lights.
5: we pulled the car over and watched this object. of course we were excited, doubtful, but this was not the first time we/i have witnessed unexplainable aircraft and beings.
6:i personally was concerned with the safety of my passengers in my car. (this btw was the car that i first saw the being who took on the appearance of the car's interior a year prior.Filed the police report with the upper providence township police department. did not tell them  i saw an "alien" just "someone" in my car. crazy stuff)
my personal reaction was/is one of awe and grateful it is not only me alone witnessing these things.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I am not tech savvy. this goes with case number 62560. i retrieved the iphone video since i submitted !St report. hoping to uphold this video properly frrom my phone.

content.detailedDescription:
A female friend and i were walking along the beach at about 10:30p.M. during march break in 1968. as we were walking along we noticed a disk shaped object, red on the top and bottom with a blue band across the width of it and green lights evenly spaced around the circumference of the blue band out over the water. the green lights seemed to pulsate and as we watched the disk began to descend. it took quite a long time to descend into the water but when it went into the water it lite the water up for at least half a mile in each direction from it's point of entry. i judged the craft to be about 3/4 to one mile off shore but it seemed like the craft was over 200 feet in diameter.

after the water stopped glowing bright red we began to continue to walk south along the beach. after about 10 minutes we ran into an older couple and i made a vague inquiry about whether they observed anything out over the ocean. the man replied "thank god, we thought we were the only ones who saw it". i then asked the man what it was that he thought he had seen and he and his wife described exactly the same object that we had observed and described the exact same decent and glowing water that we had seen. 

i was only 14 at the time and am now 59 but i will never forget what i saw that night. i can tell you with certainty that what we saw was not of this world. all my life i've been a lover of anything mechanical. i've followed the development of aircraft and space craft since i was old enough to understand what they were. i love technology and always have and always will. it's like i was hard wired to be this way. since that sighting i have always accepted that we are not alone in this universe. anyone who believes we are is either very narrow minded or just plain uninformed. what we saw was not of this world and nothing that i know of that has been developed over the past 45 years has been able to do what we saw this craft do that night. it was not parallel with the horizon but instead was on a 45 degree angle to the horizon and maintained that angle during the decent into the ocean.
content.summary: Saw over water. decended into water. lite up water for 1/2 mile ea dir.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on i-35 and noticed three lights in my rear view mirror. the lights were on top of each other, two bright lights with a smaller one in the middle. i thought at first it was a big 18 wheeler with lights on only one side - maybe burned out on the other side - and i remember thinking the 18 wheeler must be huge because the lights were so big - and high off the road.  the road was illuminated in a triangle in front of it, like it was shining down to a point. it followed me for about five minutes, maybe longer, and i kept looking in my rear view trying to figure out what it was.  it was so smooth it didn't seem like it was really moving, i kept thinking maybe it was a reflection of something - but then i'd think no, can't be, because it's lighting up the road ahead of it. i saw the tail lights of two trucks up ahead and was relieved, i am not sure what i thought but i was glad to see the tail lights.  i looked at least once and the lights were still there and then...They were not there.  just like that.  gone.  i thought i should call someone, my husband, my daughter, my best friend, and tell them i just saw a ufo.  i can't explain why i didn't even tell my husband when i got home; i didn't tell him until the next day.  and i forgot to tell him about the light on the highway coming to a point.  weird.
content.summary: Three lights followed my car on the highway,

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my patio facing south, when i noticed two objects in the air moving towards my location.  i thought they were helicopters as they approached but there was no engine noise.  as they passed over my house to the north-east, the first one rose into the cloud cover and disappeared.  the second who was following on the same course then did the same thing.  i took photographs and have two houses in the picture for a reference.  they stayed at approximately 4 to 5 hundred feet, moving silently.  event was over very quickly.  the objects appeared to pulsate and change shape and even change shades of color.
content.summary: Two objects approach fm s and head ne rising into clouds the other followed

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my drive way and i noticed a fireball going up from the south.I had seen these before and called my sister and mother outside so they could see. we then witnessed the second firebal come quickly to join the first . they were moving toward our direction and were relatively close and low. we did manage to get pics but we want to get them enlarged. anyway i was in the process of calling my friend when a 3rd fireball appeared  and took off in the same direction. these weren't just fireballs, these things were big, this just happened an hour ago, it's a rainy day too.Three witnesses, on camera. i can't enlarge too much  because i only have an mini tablet.
content.summary: Witnessed 3 fireballs ascend,hover,and take off straight up.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting at the barn with my friend warming up the truck and we saw these lights in the sky..2 to be exact..One was very bright white light and the other was a more dull dimmer light that seemed to pulse red and sometimes green..The lights hovered and didn't seem to move way above the tree line..And  and the lights faded when the sun went down.Hovered for over an hour.My video can be see on youtube just search my name michael o'neal..Search (lights in the sky tennessee 1/10/15)
content.summary: There were 2 lights one very bright star bright and a second duller light that seemed to pulsate in color..Video on file.. watched the lights remain stationary for over an hour..I do have lots of pictures and video of the event

content.detailedDescription: I was going to walmart one day, looking out the car window, when something caught my eye. it was 2 metallic orbs hovering in the sky. they had a chrome finish look to them, and they were reflecting light, but the thing that really surprised me was that the 2 ships were casting a shadow on each other. it didn't look like they were one object or docked. they were just very close together. i couldn't think of anything man-made that fit the description. i watched the objects, and it disappeared when the car passed by a building, obscuring the view of the objects. this wasn't the first time i saw a ufo. on october 31st(halloween) i saw a large(in terms of flashing light in the sky), slow flashing red light, and a smaller, faster flashing white light.
content.summary: 2 metallic orbs that were very close to each other.

content.detailedDescription: Walked out of house towards street {house faces north} got to end of driveway when above roof across street saw red light that appeared to get bigger as it approached. bright red and it made right angled turns. stopped on  a dime,turned on a dime.Watched it ascend and descend in blink of an eye. my dog was even watching it..It then went white and rapidly descend in a perfect angle behind building. stayed outside for a few minutes to see if it would appear again but after a few minutes went inside to get wife
content.summary: Bright red moving north to south.Hovered then made right angle turns..Up,down then angled descent

content.detailedDescription:
Note: this is not a ufo case.  this is however, a case filed at the nuforc that did receive a large amount of attention and was investigated by myself, sam maranto, julie maranto and mark rodeghier (cufos).  the case involves unusual damage done by an unseen force.  be it prosaic or highly unusual, extensive damage remained.  please note that the above form (what are the details of the event) observed the following:  i had marked object(s) because it was a required field.  there was no object seen!.
just needed to have something in for that field requirement.

a young women was driving approximately 40-45 mph on lake cook road while her car suddenly lurched to the right for no apparent reason. she had heard a loud thump and had looked in her rear view mirror and then to the left and right and of course in front of her, nothing was seen. she pulled over to the next side street and proceeded out of the car to evaluate the vehicle.  it was painfully apparent that the whole left side of the car including the drivers mirror had been severely damaged.  she then proceeded to call the police and file a report with the northlake police department.  the officer came out and evaluated the car and filed a report as a hit and run. feeling relative certain, that she had been side-swiped by a vehicle. she later contacted peter davenport, nuforc, who on reviewing the photos sent to him referred the case to sam maranto.    

further details will be available in the attachment.

again, to make this crystal clear, no light, object,shadow related to an object or for that matter anything was seen. yet there is extensive damage to the car and it was "bumped" into another lane.
content.summary: Not a ufo event -damage to automobile from unseen & unkown force/object

content.detailedDescription:
Good day, mufon...
i would like to report an audio event that i experienced today.
i will also make an official report on the nuforc web site.
below is my account...
thanks !!
peace,
patrice hughes

*********

january 11, 2015

today started with a noise.

at about 5:13 this morning, i woke up...And i heard it right away.

a deep, droning sound...More than just a hum...And with a “mechanical” quality to it.

i listened to it for a couple minutes, then got up to go to
the bathroom...Giggled to myself, thinking i was just hearing my bladder rumble.

no, that wasn't it...

i could hear it in the bathroom...

and all throughout the house !!

after leaving the loo, i went into every room, and looked out the windows, and up.

but the sky was very overcast, and i couldn't see anything.

as much as i wanted to go outside and look, there was “something” that told me not to do so...This morning was not a cool time to do so...And i have to admit, the sound was a bit eerie.

the most intense aspect of it was not just the noise itself...But how it seemed to be...

the best way i can described it would be that it seemed to “encapsulate” our house...As if a bowl had been put over us, upside down.

and yes, to me, this noise was loud...Quite a bit louder than the hum i regularly hear when i really listen.

so i went back to bed, and lay still and listened.

all the while this was happening, the cats were glued to me.

not freaking out and running around the house, but trying to stay as close to me as they could.

and when i came back to bed, and lay on my right side, 3 of them lay on the top of my left side...3 more lay right next to me as close as they could get...And several more were on the dressers

after about 45 minutes more, it stopped...As if someone had flipped a switch.

it didn't “fade away”...It was just suddenly gone.

the silence was very intense...Made the hairs on my arms and neck stand on end...

several of the cats came slowly over to the bedroom window to look out...And yes, they looked up.

and for the life of me, i could not get back to sleep.

my husband, troy, woke up to go to the bathroom around 8am, and i asked him if he had any weird dreams or such...He said no, but felt that the house was creepily quiet.

and no, i did not wake him up during the noise...

i had wanted to, but couldn't figure out how to do so without planting the suggestion of “hearing something weird” in his head...That would have affected his experience.

so now i must investigate this, to see if anyone has reported such an experience to mufon and nuforc.
i also emailed this to dinah lechner of florida mufon.

everything i learn, i will write down, for my own records.
*********
content.summary: Audio event that lasted a little over an hour

content.detailedDescription:
As i was walking home from my city bus stop i went through a public park called "spring bank." when i was on the road between a bridge and some washrooms i saw in the sky a large ufo: it had three lights, of which one was red and the others were probably about the same color. it was on the left side of the three stars that form a vertical line. it sounded somewhat like an airplane but something was different about it (if i had just heard the sound i would have questioned whether it was an airplane or not.) it was flying north-east. i heard strange beeping-like noises by the trees on the park road and also by the washrooms. if i stopped, it was only briefly, as i wanted to go home after a friday on my first week back to college after the christmas break. 

when i first saw it i wasn't sure what it was, but i did think it some type of jet that i hadn't seen before. when i saw it i was curious and somewhat filled with wonder. i lost sight of the object because i kept walking; i had to keep going: it was cold and i was walking. 

i saw the ufo between 7:00 and 8:00 pm (eastern time). 

for the record: i have never drunk an alcoholic beverage in my life and never used any street drugs, furthermore i was not taking any prescribed medicine at all. 

i also wanted to note that i saw two cars parked in a nearby parking lot at the far end of it. it looked like no one was in them.
content.summary: I saw a large ufo: it appeared triangle-shaped based on it's three lights, but my perception when looking at it was that it was disk-like.

content.detailedDescription: See attached video, there were five other witnesses as well. names can be submitted upon request.
content.summary: Numerous red bright objects flying over town center

content.detailedDescription:
We have had 2 encounters with "beings", who take on the appearance/color of their surroundings. our sightings include 1 in my car in our driveway where this being took on the color of the interior of my vehicle. the 2nd encounter was at the back of the house where this being was able to jump (we heard where it landed), from the ground to the next story deck then proceeded to the top of the house. stealth seemed to be it's objective and we are puzzled as to why we "caught" these beings quite accidentally. finally, "we" have witnessed what i describe as air craft of sorts. lots of them. 2 in particular have been witnessed by myself and in combination with other individuals. these are triangular in shape and huge and not moving, stationary over the house. i have some iphone video and a friend later did a sketch of what he saw. we are not ufo or alien hunters
and have no desire to attract the attention of a bunch of nut case whack jobs. thank you very much. if your group is legit, i will be willing to speak with you, as what i have stated here is not all we have witnessed. the first entity/being i saw was featureless as if it was wearing a mask for fencing. it's whole body was the same color, all of it.The being was sitting in the front seat of my car. this was quite starling and magnificent. i am a "lock" freak.I lock everything up tight and even reported this to the local police as a break in to my vehicle but did not tell the police officer i saw an alien creature only that "someone" was in my car. i believe this location/general area is full of lots of unexplainable activity and your group may be interested in investigating. thank you.
content.summary: We've seen aircraft and beings. not the human sort.

content.detailedDescription: It was 12/24/14 around midnight. i just arrived home from work (i'm a nurse at a psychiatric facility). i looked up as i always do, observing the night sky. the sky had what are called 'broken clouds' with patches of clear sky between. i looked toward the north star and watched as a pumpkin-orange light moved in a northeasterly direction and slowly faded away into the clouds. looking towards the southwest where this object appeared to be coming from, i saw a second object of the same color, follow the track or trajectory of the first. looking to the southwest again, a third light, same color again, followed behind at approximately the same distance between the first and second object and disappeared into the clouds. there was no sound. i checked the local weather and the cloud ceiling was 2700 ft. there is a civil airport less than two miles from my apt and the three lights cut across the flight path of the usual air traffic. planes don't have orange lights and these were steady and unblinking. i continued to observe the sky for approximately 15 minutes and nothing else unusual was noted.
content.summary: Three orange lights travelling southeast to northwest under cloud ceiling of 2700 ft. no sound. no maneuvers. straight line approximately 10-15 seconds apart

content.detailedDescription:
Its was approximately 2:30 am in the morning and i could not sleep so i decided to take my dog for a walk in the retirement community that we reside in.  

halfway through the walk, i looked  at some homes to the east/northeast to the large hills across the road and noticed that the valley between two hills was illuminated with light.  at first, i thought it was some hikers with bright lights or some type of vehicle with extremely bright lights. i continued to watch as everything in this small valley area was getting brighter.  then a bright white globe appeared in mid-air and was standing still a few feet off the ground.  then within a couple of seconds another one appeared behind it. both were stationary a few second until the second one  (which was behind the firsts one) moved in front and then took off heading north at a very high rate of speed a few feet above the ground. it travelled approximately 1/4 of a mile and then disappeared all within a second.  the remaining globe followed the same path at the same height and rate of speed and disappeared in a second.  no sound was ever heard from either of the objects.
content.summary: 2 bright globes hovering and moving with no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on i-76, just east of lake milton, near north jackson, oh at 10:27pm on tuesday, january 6, 2015 when i saw 2 pairs of bright red/orange round lights moving slowly from the north to the south from the woods approaching the highway.  the lights were solidly illuminated with no pulsation at all.  both sets of lights were the same distance apart, suggesting that they were on objects of the same size.  i thought they were helicopters at first, but there were no blinking lights anywhere.  as i approached where they were crossing the highway, i saw both pairs of lights stop at the same time, where they hovered for a few seconds.  then the light on the right (or the north side) raised up on both objects at the same time, and they started moving in the opposite direction (to the north) at the same time, staying the same distance apart from each other.  as i passed the point where they hovered and changed direction, i looked intently to see a shape of an aircraft, expecting to see a helicopter's shape.  i noticed that there was an outline connecting the lights, but nothing toward the left where there should have been.  that is when the third light came into view on each object and i could see the triangle outline.  the third light was a bit dimmer than the other two on each object.  there was cloud cover higher up, but the lights were bright enough that i could tell they were well below the clouds and were completely unobstructed.  once i saw the third light i immediately pulled over but the lights had disappeared over the treetops on the north side of the road by the time i came to a stop, which reaffirms that the objects were not very high up if they could not be seen after only a few seconds of moving slowly.  i could not hear anything when i got out of the car, and there was not much traffic to interfere with my ability to hear.  the first car did not pass for 5-10 seconds after i had gotten out of my car.

very shortly after first seeing them, i could tell how much bigger the lights were than would be expected on a traditional aircraft, and i could tell from the spacing that the object was very large, probably 70-100 feet on each side.  i had a feeling of wonder and was very moved in a way i had never experienced before.  another thing i thought was incredible was the fact that i read about an identical account back in march of 2014 only a couple miles from my experience.  in both cases, the lights came and returned to the north, which is also the general direction of the ravenna arsenal, a place i witnessed many training missions being flown from as i grew up living several miles to the south for 20 years.  we would see large military aircraft flying in formation over our house all the time.  this was definitely no traditional military or civilian aircraft.  nothing i have ever seen in the sky or on the land has made me feel the way this sighting did.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 dark triangle objects with red/orange lights, non-blinking on each corner, moving in formation at low altitude

content.detailedDescription: Multiple glow of lights. 12/15 orange/red.  spaced out in no particular pattern. abnormal flight sequence with improper spacing. all random flight position. heard no engines.. very quiet tonight.. look like orbs.  north to south over everglades...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple glow of lights. 12/15 orange/red.  space, abnormal flight sequence with improper spacing. all random flight position

content.detailedDescription: While driving saw the 7 white lights in a boomerang shape across my path; they just appeared suddenly.  they remained in this position for about 5-8 seconds and then blinked out simultaneously; reappeared about 8 seconds later, but this time were in a straight line formation; remained in this position for about 8 seconds and then each light blinked out separately this time.  i did not see them again. the lights were bright and surprised me by their sudden appearance.  i went home and told my husband and daughter.
content.summary: Driving home after work; spotted 7 lights in a boomerang shape

content.detailedDescription: Went out to walk the dog about 2240 pm and was looking at orion trying to locate position of comet lovejoy. a large silent triangle shaped object flew directly overhead. i could see the outline and there were lights covering each of the three tips which were rounded, not pointed.  i didn't know what it was...Possibly some experimental craft from ft. bragg.  it came from that direction (north) and flew south/se.  it flew out of sight.  no sound whatsoever.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object flew directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: i was walking our dogs at 4:30 am when i noticed two circular orange, firey pulsating oblects in the sky. they were slowly moving from the southeast to the northwest for approximately 6 minutes when they disappeared behind the clouds. i never saw them leave the cloud cover.
content.summary: 2 orange glowing circular objects silently and slowly moving in a northwestern direction.

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten home from puchasing lumber for a home project and was removing it from my truck. we are in the pattern for sky harbor so i see a lot of aircraft on their base egressing or transgressing. i saw these wide spaced lighted objects. i could not tell if they were at the same altitude, but it looked as if they were. i could see some dark behind the lights it was dusk and they were not reflecting the sunset as it was down and behind these objects. at first i thought they were a lose formation of small aircraft with their landing lights on. i went to get my binoculars from the front seat of my truck and when i reached them and turned around all but one of them had vanished. the lighting of the sunset would have sillouetted them as dark spots moving to the south as their was still back lighting enough to see an aircraft at that elevation and size. one object was still visable, and before i could get it focused on my binoculars it had gone behind a street light,,only it did not appear out the other side. i searched the sky with my naked eye and the same thing no light or no sillouette. i went across the street and asked my neighbors sitting in their garage if they saw it and none there had. two houses down another neighbor said he had not seen them but the neighbor next door had told them of seeing a similar group of objects a week or two before. i have flown aircraft, i had majored in aircraft mechanics and lived very close to a major airport in so.Calif. so i know what is out of the ordinary. the sky was not dark enough for stars with the exception of planets close to the sun, which definately would not be seen in a group or suddenly just blink out.  to be seen in that part of the sky
content.summary: Several wide spaced lighted objects wide formation now you see them, now you don't

content.detailedDescription: We noticed a star-like light in the sky but it's movement was highly unusual. we were walking home in our neighborhood when we noticed a very bright star. at first we thought it was a star or plane but then we took a couple of steps and the light tracked us very quickly across the sky. we took a few more steps and it tracked us again, moving across large areas of space almost instantly. the object then moved away at high speeds, blinked, and disappeared in plain sight. we were skeptical at first, but the rate of speed which the object moved across the sky was difficult to understand. the object left us confused and even afraid.
content.summary: We noticed a star-like light in the sky but it's movement was highly unusual.
